sentences.english: This usually occurs during failure scenarios or periods of high load.
sentences.chinese: 这种景象经常产生在体系故障或者是高负荷的景象下。

sentences.english: This usually occurs during failure scenarios or periods of high load.
sentences.chinese: 这种景象经常产生在体系故障或者是高负荷的景象下。

sentences.english: It was a haunting vision, the past compellingly present.
sentences.chinese: 这是一幅令人难以忘怀的景象，过去分明就在眼前。

sentences.english: A banal landscape of ugly new towers flanks both sides.
sentences.chinese: 马路两遍的是平凡丑陋的新摩天大楼的景象。

sentences.english: You use all of your senses in guided imagery.
sentences.chinese: 在进行引导式景象刻画时，你要运用到一切感官。

sentences.english: Its pale rays fled out on either hand; beautiful but grim was the vision they disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 微弱的光线向两旁流泻而出，照出的景象美丽而阴森。

sentences.english: The scene awakens reminiscences of my youth.
sentences.chinese: 这景象唤起我年轻时的往事。

sentences.english: Carrie had noticed the appearance of gayety and pleasure-seeking in the streets which they were following.
sentences.chinese: 嘉莉注意到沿途那喜庆热闹和寻欢作乐的景象。

sentences.english: You're a goddam swordboat captain! Is there any thing better in the world?
sentences.chinese: 你是一船之长，世上还有比这更美妙的景象吗？

sentences.english: The scene of this production Ouqi called cavitation bubble.
sentences.chinese: 把这种产怄气泡的景象称为汽蚀。

sentences.english: It's a spectacular sight as the flamingos lift into the air.
sentences.chinese: 一群红鹳飞向空中，景象十分壮观。

sentences.english: Thee beauty of the winter scene let me forget the cold, feel four spring-like.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的美丽景象让我忘记了寒冷，感觉四季如春。

sentences.english: Also sometimes we ca powerful see the " North Pole light" .
sentences.chinese: 同时还有极昼极夜景象并且有时能看到北极光。

sentences.english: The scene photographed itself on my mind.
sentences.chinese: 这个景象深深地印在我的脑海中。

sentences.english: Our vision helped us turn many of our Hems into Haws.
sentences.chinese: 这种景象使许多的哼哼变成了唧唧。

sentences.english: The city downtown of Kurla (Kuerle) Xinjiang China.
sentences.chinese: 中国新疆库尔勒市的城区景象。
